title: Cant log in into client while able on website.
body: I just redownloaded lol after quite an absence looking to get into game again. So I hit website and read all changes that happened while downloading. After while I get into client and write my login and password(which I before confirmed by logging onto website) and it says its incorrect. After couple tries I decide I could change my password anyway since its old one. I do and login onto site again with new info, but client still wont take it saying its wrong.

replies.body: It sounds like your patcher might be on the wrong region!  When you return to the patcher, are you set to EUNE or something else?  Let me know if it helps!
